question:
Question: What is the correct summary of your trajectory from start to current position?  
Choice:  
A. I start from above the basketball court, move upward, backward, and then move right to my current position.  
B. I start from above the basketball court, move upward, then move to the right, and reach my current position above the track and field.  
C. I start from the street, move up to the roof of the building, then fly over the basketball court, and then move towards the track and field.  
D. I start from above the basketball court, move upward and forward to the top of the track and field, and then descend to my current position.  
E. I start from the parking lot, fly over the basketball court, then turn left into the track and field and reach my current location.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The trajectory starts from above the basketball court, moves upward, then shifts to the right, and finally reaches a position above the track and field area, which matches the description in option B.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 30)]
Option: B
Reason: The video starts with a view above the basketball court (0-2s). Then the view moves upward and to the right, ending above the track and field (2-30s). This matches option B.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The trajectory starts from above the basketball court, moves upward, then shifts to the right, and finally reaches a position above the track and field area, which matches the description in option B.
